plot: Carrie Remington seems like any other struggling waitress who's had a run of bad luck including a recent divorce. Things seem to be improving when she moves in with Ashley Dunnfield...things take a turn when Ashley starts digging into her past and finds out that there is much she didn't know about her new roommate's sinister history.   Written by  AshleyLeggat
title: Falsa amistad (TV)
